text: Basi jwalijose (mwa ŵanganyao) twankwembekenye ni sambi syakwe. Basi ŵane mwa jamanjao pana ŵatwatumichisye chimbunga cha sakalawe, ŵane mwa ŵanganyao pana ŵawakwembekenye n’gumilo (waipotesi), ŵane mwa ŵanganyao pana ŵatwatitimisye nalyo litaka, soni ŵane mwa ŵanganyao pana ŵatwamisyisye. Sano Allah nganijuŵa jwanti ni kwatenda lupuso ŵanganyao, nambo kuti ŵanyao ni ŵaŵaliji nkulitenda lupuso achimisyene
